sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbatchresult ( BATCH_RESULT_ID , batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , paramtr , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #batchResultId# , #batchSchdulId# , #batchOpertId# , #paramtr# , #sttus# , #errorInfo# , #executBeginTm# , #executEndTm# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbatchresult SET batch_result_id = #batchResultId# , batch_schdul_id = #batchSchdulId# , batch_opert_id = #batchOpertId# , paramtr = #paramtr# , sttus = #sttus# , error_info = #errorInfo# , execut_begin_tm = #executBeginTm# , execut_end_tm = #executEndTm# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# WHERE batch_result_id = #batchResultId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT batch_result_id , batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , paramtr , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id FROM comtnbatchresult WHERE batch_result_id = #batchResultId#

SELECT batch_result_id , batch_schdul_id , batch_opert_id , paramtr , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id FROM comtnbatchresult WHERE 1=1
batch_result_id = #searchKeyword#
batch_schdul_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY batch_result_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbatchresult WHERE 1=1
batch_result_id = #searchKeyword#
batch_schdul_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
